mapper.select: SELECT Q_NO , Q_TITLE , TO_CHAR (Q_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , A_YN FROM CUSTOMER_CENTER ORDER BY Q_NO DESC

SELECT C.Q_NO , M.NICK , TO_CHAR (C.Q_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , A_CONTENT , TO_CHAR (C.A_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANSWER_DATE FROM CUSTOMER_CENTER C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE C.Q_NO = #{qNo}
